sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; export default class LoginForm extends React.Component { validationSchema() { return Yup.object().shape({ username: Yup.string() .required("Username is required") .min(6, "Username must be at least 6 characters") .max(20, "Username must not exceed 20 characters"), email: Yup.string() .required("Email is required") .email("Email is invalid"), password: Yup.string() .required("Password is required") .min(6, "Password must be at least 6 characters") .max(40, "Password must not exceed 40 characters"), confirmPassword: Yup.string() .required("Confirm Password is required") .oneOf([Yup.ref("password"), null], "Confirm Password does not match"), }); } constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(data) { console.log(JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)); } render() { const initialValues = { fullname: "", username: "", email: "", password: "", confirmPassword: "", acceptTerms: false, }; return (
{({ errors, touched, resetForm }) => (
)}
); } }
